          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">How Do You Learn? - Reading Comprehension</string>
            <string language="en">How Do You Learn? - Reading comprehension</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie Erlernen Sie? - Leseerfassen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment Apprenez-vous ? - compréhension de 
lecture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como Você Aprende? - compreensão da 
leitura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come Imparate? - comprensione della 
lettura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς μαθαίνετε; - Κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cómo Usted Aprende? - comprensión de la 
lectura</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Complete the text about learning and different styles of learning by filling in the blanks.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
            <string language="en">Complete the text about learning and different styles of learning by filling in the blanks. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">school</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="sv">reading comprehension</string>
            <string language="sv">learning</string>
            <string language="sv">styles of learning</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">school</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
            <string language="en">learning</string>
            <string language="en">styles of learning</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Führen Sie den Text über das Lernen und die 
unterschiedlichen Arten des Lernens durch, indem Sie die Leerzeichen 
ausfüllen. Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - 
Modul 6 - was wurden Sie mögen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Remplissez le texte au sujet de l'étude et des 
différents modèles de l'étude en complétant les blancs. 
Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - module 6 -
que aimez-vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Termine o texto sobre a aprendizagem e estilos 
diferentes da aprendizagem enchendo nos espaços em branco. 
Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento para novatos - 
módulo 6 - que  você gosta?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Completi il testo circa imparare e stili 
differenti di imparare riempiendosi negli spazii in bianco. 
Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - modulo 6 - 
che cosa gradite?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συμπληρώστε το κείμενο για την εκμάθηση και τις 
διαφορετικές μορφές της εκμάθησης με να συμπληρώσει τα κενά. 
Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους 
αρχαρίους - ενότητα 6 - τι θα θέλατε;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Termine el texto sobre aprender y diversos estilos
de aprender completando los espacios en blanco. ¿Safir - inglés
y vida laboral para los principiantes - módulo 6 - qué  usted tiene 
gusto?</string>
          </description>
